Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.DBConnection

extends java.lang.Object
    the DBConnection class is used to build a connection object

      • verifyLogin

        public static java.lang.Boolean verifyLogin​(java.lang.String user,
                                            java.lang.String pw)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Verifies username and password combinations in MySQL database
        Parameters:
        user - username
        pw - password
        Returns:
        true if valid login, false if invalid username/password combination
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if connection fails
